lead_paragraph: If Army can win at least six games this season, it will be invited to the Poinsettia Bowl on Dec. 19 in San Diego, bowl officials and the United States Military Academy announced yesterday. Army’s opponent would be a representative of the Mountain West Conference. Teams with at least 6-6 records are considered bowl eligible this season.
